agenda_items.topic: Confirmation of the Minutes of 33rd (Special) BoG Meeting
agenda_items.decision: Minutes of 33rd BoG held on April 13, 2015 confirmed without modification.

agenda_items.topic: Action taken on decisions of 32nd and 33rd BoG meetings
decision: Audit Report 2013-14: Act as per 26th FC recommendations.
100% waiver of tuition fees for SC/ST M.Tech, Dual Degree, PhD students: Follow MHRD letter directives.
PIRD complaint against Prof. Probir Kumar Bose: Fact-finding report submitted to Chairman, to be forwarded to MHRD.
Court cases against NIT Agartala: Constitute Legal Cell to manage cases and ensure timely submission of counter affidavits.
Action taken reports should be serially placed; mention if no action necessary.

agenda_items.decision: Approved recommendations; nominated Dr. Richi Prasad Sharma (BWC) and Dr. John Deb Barma (FC) as BoG representatives.
Noted minutes; administrative approval items placed separately; financial items through FC; Director to convene BWC, FC, BoG frequently.
Approved recommendations; Chairperson of BoG to seek explanation from Chairman BWC on 34.7; adherence to GFR, Act, Statutes; revamp procedures; ensure proper minutes preparation.
Ratified appointments made by Director; Chairperson may approve time-bound cases emergently.

decision: Approved EPF contribution for contractual employees with monthly remuneration up to Rs. 15,000.
For remuneration above Rs. 15,000, follow Ministry of Labour & Employment guidelines.

agenda_items.topic: Estimate for 2.0 MLD Water Treatment Plant
agenda_items.decision: Proper justification and estimates to be placed before FC first.

agenda_items.topic: Revamping lakes, water harvesting, beautification of water bodies
agenda_items.decision: In principle approved; activities to be planned carefully considering fund position; tentative estimates after FC recommendation.

agenda_items.topic: Up-gradation of internal main road with footpaths, drains, bus stops, etc.
decision: Fact-finding inquiry by Chairperson after Directorâ€™s explanation.
BWC to follow proper procedures in future.

agenda_items.topic: General Provident Fund (GPF) Rules for employees
agenda_items.decision: In principle approved; draft rules to be forwarded to Director NITs, MHRD for review and placed in next Board meeting.

agenda_items.topic: Grade Pay enhancement for non-faculty cadre
agenda_items.decision: Approved Grade Pay enhancement with MACP for 6 non-faculty staff members.

sub_items.topic: Expansion of Campus Wide Networking (Phase III)
sub_items.decision: In principle approved; execute work maintaining due procedures; Director authorized.

sub_items.topic: Lodging FIR against Prof. Probir Kumar Bose
sub_items.decision: Seek guidance from MHRD before proceeding.

sub_items.topic: Appointment of Officer on Special Duty (OSD) on contract
sub_items.decision: Approved recommendation of selection committee; Dr. N.K. Kole appointed.

meeting_end: Meeting ended with vote of thanks to the Chair
